string-array.name: cuisine_type_description
string-array.item: American cuisine is diverse and a fusion of different cuisines. It is widely known for cheeseburgers, hot dogs, and bbq.
Japanese cuisine is based on rice, noodles, soups, vegetables and seafood.
Chinese cuisine staples rice and noodles with a side of protein.
Korean cuisine staples rice, noodles, vegetables, and a protein. Many of the dishes are mixed with spices and served with side dishes.
Italian cuisine is rich in pasta, fish, fruits, and vegetables.
